mapper.select: SELECT c.id id, c.article_id articleId, u.nickname nickname, u.username username, u.email email, u.website website, (SELECT count(0) cnum FROM replies r WHERE r.comment_id = c.id) reply_count, u.avatar avatar, u.id user_id, c.content content, DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') create_time FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user u on c.user_id = u.id where c.article_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE comment c SET c.status = #{status} WHERE c.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM (SELECT c.status FROM comment c UNION ALL SELECT r.status FROM replies r) m WHERE m.status = 0
